overview: We warned you last time! Winner for "Best Vignette Release of the Year" XBIZ 2015! These girls are back and more vindictive than ever!! Four tales of seduction and twisted blackmail by young girls who know exactly what they want, and how to trap their prey... to get it!! The lure of a young, attractive, horny girl has blinded the better judgment of these unsuspecting guys. These girls may look innocent, but deception takes on many different forms.
title: Entrapments 2
